Assign conditional expression to enable or disable selected objects

Generates and places on the clipboard a snippet of Java code

Adds many entities to the current view

Automatically answers of 'No To All' anytime you close a view

Toggles the option to show the grid on the screen
Toggles the option to suppress the early access release nag dialog

translation.note: messages telling the user how many actions will be undone. This is used when 0 or multiple actions are selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be undone. This is used when only 1 action is selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be redone. This is used when 0 or multiple actions are selected.
messages telling the user how many actions will be redone. This is used when only 1 action is selected.

The title for the border that surrounds the grouping buttons on the tool palette

The title for the border that surrounds the drawing buttons on the tool palette
